577:1: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhāṣiṣyate-yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛtaḥ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
577:3: tatra subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate tasya amanuṣyasyāpakramaṇāya|
577:5: māro hyatra pāpīyāṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cirayānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaraṃ tejovattaraṃ codyogamāpatsyate-kathamayamamanuṣyo'pakrāmediti|
577:7: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati-mamaiṣo'nubhāvena amanuṣyo'pakrānta iti|
577:8: na punaḥ sa evaṃ jñāsyati-mārasyaiṣo'nubhāvena amanuṣyo'pakrānta iti|
577:10: sa tenautsukyena tato'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagdhayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati-ahaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti|
577:11: sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa bhūyo mānaṃ janayiṣyati,
577:20: sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena mithyāmānena abhimānena dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
577:25: sa tathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi kalyāṇadharmaṇa udārādhimuktikānadhyāśayasaṃpannānupāyakuśalānavinivartanīyadharmasamanvāgatāṃśca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān dṛṣṭvā abhimānamutpādya avamanyamānastathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate,
577:31: evaṃ subhūte satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyānacirayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya alpaśraddhasya alpaśrutasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya antarāyaṃ kariṣyatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
577:32: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarma veditavyam||
577:33: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati|
577:34: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpedeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati?
577:35: iha subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ nāmāpadeśenāpi nāmādhiṣṭhānenāpi māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramiṣyati|
577:36: anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati-tairvyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
577:44: yāvadāsaptamaṃ mātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyamudīrayiṣyati-amuṣyāṃ diśi tvaṃ jātaḥ,
577:45: amuṣmin janapade amuṣmin grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā jāta iti|
577:65: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstena tena dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇa guṇenādekṣyati-pūrvamapi tvamanena cānena ca guṇena samanvāgato'bhūḥ|
577:66: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau|
577:68: tathā hi te amī evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante|
577:70: evaṃ sa tena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena pratyutpannadhutaguṇasaṃlekhena ca manyanāmutpādayiṣyati|
577:71: tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati-vyākṛto'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
577:73: taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ vakṣyati-avinivartanīyastvaṃ vyākṛtastathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
577:75: tathā hi tava ete evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇā saṃvidyante|
577:76: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāyīyān kadācidbhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
577:87: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati-vyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau|
577:89: tathā hi te evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
577:91: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇā ākhyātāḥ ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni cākhyātāni,
577:95: ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
577:97: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nena nāmādhiṣṭhānena abhimānamutpādayiṣyati|
577:98: abhimānamutpādya mānābhibhūtaḥ stambhābhibhūto mārādhiṣṭhānenābhibhūtastadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagghayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati|
577:99: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam||
577:100: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam|
577:101: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam?
577:102: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vyākariṣyati-tavānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yadeva tena cittenānuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritaṃ bhavati-aho bata me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idamevaṃrūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
577:104: tatra duṣprajñajātīyasya anupāyakuśalasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati-yathā mayā nāmadheyamanuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritam,
577:105: aho bata me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
577:108: yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam,
577:109: tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ,
577:110: yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā,
577:111: nāmavyākṛto'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti maṃsyate|
577:112: yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni,
577:115: sa manyanāmutpādya tato'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate-ahaṃ vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
577:117: evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena abhimānena mithyāmānena ca tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamanyamāno dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
577:119: tasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā-śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā|
577:120: sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo bhavet,
577:130: tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mananāpattisthānam|
577:131: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣoḥ śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti,
577:135: yaduta nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvamānanayā mahānakuśalaścittotpāda utpannaḥ|
577:138: pañcabhyo'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaro'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ,
577:139: yo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena mānasahagataścittotpāda utpannaḥ|
577:140: ayaṃ tebhyaḥ pañcabhya ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaraścittotpādo veditavyaḥ|
577:141: iti hi subhūte anenāpi nāmāpadeśena sūkṣmasūkṣmāṇi mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante|
577:145: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati|
577:146: kathaṃ ca subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati?
577:147: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyati,
577:149: na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi,
577:150: yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni,
577:152: subhūtirāha-katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni?
577:155: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,
577:157: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto viharati|
577:158: grāmānte'pi hi viharan prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvamaitrīmahākaruṇāvihāreṇa viharet|
577:159: anena vihāreṇa viharan vivikta eva sa viharati|
577:160: ayaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviveko'nujñātaḥ|
577:161: anena vivekena viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdivānyatināmayati,
577:165: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekamupadekṣyati araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānaprāntaśayanāsanavihārān,
577:166: sa tena vivekena śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ saṃkīrṇa eva san prajñāpāramitāyāmanabhiyujyamāno na sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayati|
577:167: evaṃ sa saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharan so'pariśuddhena manasikāreṇa viharan apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ eva bhaviṣyati|
577:168: apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmānta eva saṃstato'nyānapi bodhisattvān mahāsattvān grāmāntavihāriṇo'saṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāvihāravihāriṇo'vamaṃsyate|
577:169: araṇye'pi viharan so'pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ san saṃkīrṇavihāryeva bhavati,
577:171: sa prajñopāyamahākaruṇāvihāravihāriṇo grāmānte viharataḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmasamudācārān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviviktānasaṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraistāṃstāvatso'vamanyamāno na dhyānasamādhisamāpattivimokṣābhijñānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati|
577:175: kiṃcāpi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yojanaśatikeṣvaṭavīkāntāreṣu viharedapagatavyālamṛgapakṣisaṃgheṣu apagatakṣudramṛgavyālayakṣarākṣasānuvicariteṣu apagatacaurakāntārabhayabhairavopadraveṣu saṃtiṣṭhet,
577:176: varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
577:178: imaṃ ca vivekaṃ mayopadiṣṭaṃ na jānīyāt,
577:182: naiva me subhūte etāvatā sa bodhisattvaścittamārādhayati|
577:184: yaḥ subhūte viveko bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mayā ākhyātaḥ,
577:185: tena vivekena viharannasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate|
577:186: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitvā evaṃ vakṣyati-sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
577:187: eṣa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatena viveka ākhyātaḥ|
577:190: sa tato vivekātpunareva araṇyādgrāmāntamavatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān bhikṣūn sabrahmacāriṇaḥ kalyāṇadharmaṇo'saṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntān jīvānavamaṃsyate|
577:191: sa evaṃ vakṣyati-saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti,
577:195: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti,
577:206: eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi|
577:218: tajjātīyaḥ khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ|
577:220: abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ|
577:222: aviśuddhadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ|
577:223: anāryā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ|
577:224: anāryadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ|
577:225: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ,
577:228: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ kartukāmena tajjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyāḥ,
577:231: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāmarthāya abhyutthitena eteṣāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ ca mārakarmaṇāmavabodhāya nityamevodvignacittena bhavitavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamapratilabhamānānāmupadeṣṭumutrastamānasena asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātukena|
577:232: tatrāpi tāvanmaitrāyamāṇena karuṇāyamānena mahākaruṇāmutpādya anukampāmupādāya samyakpratipanneṣu sattveṣu muditacittenānupalabdhidharmatayā dharmāṇāmupekṣakeṇa evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-tathā kariṣyāmi yathā sarve mārakarmadoṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā ca na bhaviṣyanti,
577:237: ayamapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ|
577:238: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivekaguṇena mārakarma veditavyamiti||
